title: Greenbelt Park: Park Home
body: Welcome to the Urban Oasis, Greenbelt Park, Maryland  Just twelve miles from Washington, D.C., Greenbelt Park is located in suburban Greenbelt, Maryland. The park features a 174 site campground with specific site reservations, nine miles of trails, and three picnic areas.Â  The campground is open all year round.The campground is known for its affordability, safety, peaceful surroundings, and National Park Service hospitality.              Site Specific Campground Reservation   Greenbelt Park offers 174 campground sites with hot showers and bathroom facilities. We offer site specific reservations year round.            Every Kid in a Park Pass   4th Graders, learn how to earn your FREE Pass or Exchange your Every Kid in a Park paper pass for the permanent plastic pass.         Trail Crew volunteers wanted August 20   Come make a difference on a trail project in Greenbelt Park on Saturday Aug 20. Trail Crew volunteers meet once a month to work on trails.
